Content:
[u'Scrapy is a fast high-level screen scraping and web crawling
framework, used to crawl websites and extract structured data from their
pages. It can be used for a wide range of purposes, from data mining to
monitoring and automated testing.'][u'Simple', u'', u'Scrapy was designed with simplicity in mind, by providing the features
  you need without getting in your way', u'', u'Productive', u'', u'Just write the rules to extract the data from web pages and let Scrapy
  crawl the entire web site for you', u'', u'Fast', u'', u'Scrapy is used in production crawlers to completely scrape more than
  500 retailer sites daily, all in one server', u'', u'Extensible', u'', u'Scrapy was designed with extensibility in mind and so it provides
  several mechanisms to plug new code without having to touch the framework
  core', u'Portable, open-source, 100% Python', u'', u'Scrapy is completely written in Python and runs on Linux, Windows, Mac and BSD', u'', u'Batteries included', u'', u'Scrapy comes with lots of functionality built in. Check', u'this
    section', u'of the documentation for a list of them.', u'', u'Well-documented & well-tested', u'', u'Scrapy is', u'extensively documented', u'and has an comprehensive test suite
  with', u'very good code
    coverage', u'', u'Healthy community', u'', u'5,000 stars, 1,300 forks, 400 watchers on Github (', u'link', u')', u'1,300 followers on Twitter (', u'link', u')', u'1,900 questions on StackOverflow (', u'link', u')', u'1,800 members, 150 messages per month on mailing list (', u'link', u')', u'40-50 users always connected to IRC channel (', u'link', u')', u'', u'Commercial support', u'', u'A few companies provide Scrapy consulting and support', u'', u"Still not sure if Scrapy is what you're looking for?. Check out", u'Scrapy at a
    glance', u'.', u'Companies using Scrapy', u'', u'Scrapy is being used in large production environments, to crawl
  thousands of sites daily. Here is a list of', u'Companies
    using Scrapy', u'.', u'', u'Where to start?', u'', u'Start by reading', u'Scrapy at a glance', u',
  then', u'download Scrapy', u'and follow the', u'Tutorial', u'.']
Heading: [u'What is Scrapy?', u'Features'][u'Companies using Scrapy', u'Where to start?']
